mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.status AS "status", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.version AS "version", a.USER_ID AS "userId", a.MODIFY_TIME AS "modifyTime", a.ORIGINAL_PASSWORD AS "originalPassword", a.PASSWORD AS "password"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_sys_user_password a
ORDER BY ${entityPage.orderBy} ${entityPage.order}
ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_user_password( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, USER_ID, MODIFY_TIME, ORIGINAL_PASSWORD, PASSWORD ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 1, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{userId}, #{modifyTime}, #{originalPassword}, #{password} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_user_password SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime}, USER_ID = #{userId}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime}, ORIGINAL_PASSWORD = #{originalPassword}, PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
